quest.name: Flowers for Sanduruva
journal:
Maru is looking longingly at the sky.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Deliver the green astamudgara to Maru.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Got a moment to spare? I've been wantin' some flowers to lay down as an offerin' to Sanduruva...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Only a certain kind'll do, though─dark green astamudgara. They only grow at Night's Watch, to the east of Yedlihmad.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: They'll fall to bits if you don't pick 'em right, but I reckon you've got a delicate touch. More so than any of us clumsy oafs, that's for certain...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Anyhow, a pair of our Riders'll be standin' by in case you need assistance gettin' up or down. Flower pickin' ain't their forte, but I've never seen such hippo-cart derrin'-do...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Yeah, these are the ones! An' in great condition, too.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Of all eight colors of astamudgara, they say Sanduruva likes this dark green the best.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: When you're prayin' for good business, it's these flowers or nothin'. We've gotta make sure we're pullin' out all the stops, after all...
